info.name: Bingwa - Business Logic
info.description: Complete business logic API including subscription plans, customers, offers, configurations, campaigns, transactions, schedules, and agent subscriptions

body.raw:
{
  "name": "5GB Data Bundle",
  "description": "5GB valid for 30 days",
  "type": "data",
  "amount": 5,
  "units": "GB",

  "price": 500,
  "currency": "KES",
  "discount_percentage": 0,

  "validity_days": 30,
  "validity_label": "30 Days",

  "ussd_code_template": "*456*1*4*6*4*2*{phone}*1*1#",
  "ussd_processing_type": "express",
  "ussd_expected_response": "CON",
  "ussd_error_pattern": "END|ERROR",

  "is_featured": false,
  "is_recurring": false,
  "max_purchases_per_customer": 1,

  "available_from": "2026-02-25T00:00:00Z",
  "available_until": "2026-03-31T23:59:59Z",

  "tags": ["data", "5GB", "monthly"],
  "metadata": {
    "network": "Safaricom",
    "category": "internet_bundle"
  }
}

{
  "name": "Super 5GB Weekly Bundle",
  "description": "Get 5GB of high-speed data valid for 7 days at a discounted price.",
  "type": "data",
  "amount": 5,
  "units": "GB",

  "price": 500,
  "discount_percentage": 10,

  "validity_days": 7,
  "validity_label": "7 Days",

  "ussd_code_template": "*123*5*1#",
  "ussd_processing_type": "express",
  "ussd_expected_response": "CON Your data bundle has been activated successfully",
  "ussd_error_pattern": "INSUFFICIENT|FAILED|ERROR",

  "is_featured": true,
  "is_recurring": false,
  "max_purchases_per_customer": 3,

  "available_from": "2026-03-01T00:00:00Z",
  "available_until": "2026-12-31T23:59:59Z",

  "tags": ["data", "weekly", "promotion", "featured"],

  "metadata": {
    "campaign": "Q1 Data Promo",
    "updated_by": "admin_user",
    "priority": "high"
  }
}

{
  "offer_id": 1,
  "customer_phone": "0712345678",
  "customer_name": "John Doe",
  "payment_method": "mpesa",
  "amount_paid": 1200,
  "currency": "KES",
  "status": "completed",

  "mpesa_transaction_id": "LZM123ABC",
  "mpesa_receipt_number": "ABC123XYZ",
  "mpesa_transaction_date": "2026-02-25T10:30:00Z",
  "mpesa_phone_number": "0712345678",
  "mpesa_message": "Payment received successfully",

  "device_info": {
    "device_id": "DEVICE-001",
    "device_model": "Samsung Galaxy S23",
    "os_version": "Android 13"
  },

  "metadata": {
    "agent_id": 10,
    "channel": "web",
    "notes": "First-time purchase"
  }
}

{
  "offer_id": 1,
  "customer_phone": "0712345678",

  "scheduled_time": "2026-03-01T08:00:00Z",

  "auto_renew": true,
  "renewal_period": "monthly",
  "renewal_limit": 6,
  "renew_until": "2026-09-01T08:00:00Z",

  "metadata": {
    "created_by": "admin",
    "channel": "web_dashboard",
    "note": "Customer requested automatic renewal for 6 months"
  }
}

{
  "ussd_response": "CON Your data bundle has been activated successfully. Thank you for choosing our service.",
  "ussd_session_id": "SESSION_9f8a7b6c123",
  "ussd_processing_time": 1450,
  "status": "success",
  "failure_reason": ""
}

{
  "plan_code": "PRO-001",
  "name": "Pro Plan",
  "description": "Designed for growing businesses with advanced needs",
  
  "price": 5000,
  "currency": "KES",
  "setup_fee": 200,
  
  "billing_usage": 500,
  "billing_cycle": "monthly",
  "overage_charge": 20,
  
  "max_offers": 50,
  "max_customers": 500,
  "features": {
    "priority_support": true,
    "custom_reports": true,
    "multi_agent_access": true
  },
  
  "is_public": true,
  "metadata": {
    "category": "professional",
    "created_by": "admin"
  }
}
